mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, ACTN_MSG_ID, ACTN_MSG_LNM, ACTN_MSG_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ACTN_CD, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ACTN_MSG_CTNT, ACTN_USE_YN, ACTN_DEL_YN, ACTN_CD_APL_DT, CHNL_MSG_CD, CHNL_TYP_CD, MCI_LNK_YN, MCI_LNK_DT
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_ACTN_MSG (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, ACTN_MSG_ID, ACTN_MSG_LNM, ACTN_MSG_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ACTN_CD, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ACTN_MSG_CTNT, ACTN_USE_YN, ACTN_DEL_YN, ACTN_CD_APL_DT, CHNL_MSG_CD, CHNL_TYP_CD, MCI_LNK_YN, MCI_LNK_DT) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{actnMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnMsgCtnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnUseYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnDelYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actnCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlMsgCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnlTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mciLnkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mciLnkDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_ACTN_MSG WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
insert into WAQ_ACTN_MSG
RQST_NO,
RQST_SNO,
ACTN_MSG_ID,

ACTN_MSG_PNM,
RQST_DCD,
RVW_STS_CD,
RVW_CONTS,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,

CHNL_MSG_CD,

#{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{actnMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actnMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{actnMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

1,

mapper.update:
update WAQ_ACTN_MSG
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTN_MSG_ID = #{actnMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_MSG_LNM = #{actnMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_MSG_PNM = #{actnMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_CD = #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD = #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_MSG_CTNT = #{actnMsgCtnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_USE_YN = #{actnUseYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_DEL_YN = #{actnDelYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTN_CD_APL_DT = #{actnCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_MSG_CD = #{chnlMsgCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHNL_TYP_CD = #{chnlTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCI_LNK_YN = #{mciLnkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCI_LNK_DT = #{mciLnkDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_ACTN_MSG RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTN_MSG_ID = #{actnMsgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_MSG_LNM = #{actnMsgLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_MSG_PNM = #{actnMsgPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_CD = #{actnCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD = #{errTlgLanDscd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_MSG_CTNT = #{actnMsgCtnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_USE_YN = #{actnUseYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_DEL_YN = #{actnDelYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTN_CD_APL_DT = #{actnCdAplDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_MSG_CD = #{chnlMsgCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHNL_TYP_CD = #{chnlTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCI_LNK_YN = #{mciLnkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MCI_LNK_DT = #{mciLnkDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.ACTN_MSG_ID, A.ACTN_MSG_LNM, A.ACTN_MSG_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_RMK, A.VRF_CD, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , A.ACTN_CD, A.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, A.ACTN_MSG_CTNT, A.ACTN_USE_YN, A.ACTN_DEL_YN, A.ACTN_CD_APL_DT, A.CHNL_MSG_CD, A.CHNL_TYP_CD, A.MCI_LNK_YN, A.MCI_LNK_DT FROM WAQ_ACTN_MSG A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE WAQ_ACTN_MSG A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.ACTN_MSG_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_ACTN_MSG B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') --AND B.ACTN_MSG_ID = A.ACTN_MSG_ID AND CASE WHEN A.ACTN_MSG_ID IS NULL THEN A.ACTN_CD ELSE A.ACTN_MSG_ID END = CASE WHEN A.ACTN_MSG_ID IS NULL THEN B.ACTN_CD ELSE B.ACTN_MSG_ID END ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 메시지 존재....(MS012) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_ACTN_MSG D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.ACTN_CD = D.ACTN_CD AND NVL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

--검증쿼리 메시지코드 중복 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_ACTN_MSG D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.ACTN_CD = D.ACTN_CD
AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)
--검증쿼리 존재하지 않는 메시지 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ACTN_MSG D WHERE A.ACTN_CD = D.ACTN_CD AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ACTN_MSG D WHERE A.ACTN_CD = D.ACTN_CD AND NVL(A.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD , '_') = NVL(D.ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD , '_') AND NVL(A.ACTN_MSG_CTNT, '_') = NVL(D.ACTN_MSG_CTNT , '_') AND NVL(A.ACTN_USE_YN, '_') = NVL(D.ACTN_USE_YN , '_') AND NVL(A.ACTN_DEL_YN, '_') = NVL(D.ACTN_DEL_YN , '_') AND NVL(A.ACTN_CD_APL_DT, '_') = NVL(D.ACTN_CD_APL_DT , '_') AND NVL(A.CHNL_MSG_CD, '_') = NVL(D.CHNL_MSG_CD , '_') AND NVL(A.CHNL_TYP_CD, '_') = NVL(D.CHNL_TYP_CD , '_') AND NVL(A.MCI_LNK_YN, '_') = NVL(D.MCI_LNK_YN , '_') AND NVL(A.MCI_LNK_DT, '_') = NVL(D.MCI_LNK_DT , '_') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAQ_ACTN_MSG
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATE , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.sql: ACTN_MSG_LNM, ACTN_MSG_PNM, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, ACTN_CD, ERR_TLG_LAN_DSCD, ACTN_MSG_CTNT, ACTN_USE_YN, ACTN_DEL_YN, ACTN_CD_APL_DT, CHNL_MSG_CD, CHNL_TYP_CD, MCI_LNK_YN, MCI_LNK_DT
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WAQ_ACTN_MSG WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_ACTN_MSG A SET (ACTN_MSG_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.ACTN_MSG_ID AS ACTN_MSG_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_ACTN_MSG B WHERE B.ACTN_CD = A.ACTN_CD AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ACTN_MSG B WHERE B.ACTN_CD = A.ACTN_CD AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_ACTN_MSG A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_ACTN_MSG B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.ACTN_CD = A.ACTN_CD )
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_ACTN_MSG SELECT A.ACTN_MSG_ID,
FROM WAQ_ACTN_MSG A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_ACTN_MSG A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_ACTN_MSG B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.ACTN_CD = A.ACTN_CD ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_ACTN_MSG SELECT A.ACTN_MSG_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , SYSDATE AS STR_DTM ,
FROM WAQ_ACTN_MSG A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
